channel.title: CWE-642 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in CWE-642 on ZAP

item.title: ASP.NET ViewState Integrity
item.description: The application does not use a Message Authentication Code (MAC) to protect the integrity of the ASP.NET ViewState, which can be tampered with by a malicious client

item.title: Emails Found in the Viewstate
item.description: The following emails were found being serialized in the viewstate field:

item.title: Old Asp.Net Version in Use
item.description: This website uses ASP.NET version 1.0 or 1.1.

item.title: Potential IP Addresses Found in the Viewstate
item.description: The following potential IP addresses were found being serialized in the viewstate field:

item.title: Split Viewstate in Use
item.description: This website uses ASP.NET’s Viewstate and its value is split into several chunks.

item.title: Viewstate without MAC Signature (Sure)
item.description: This website uses ASP.NET’s Viewstate but without any MAC.

item.title: Viewstate without MAC Signature (Unsure)
item.description: This website uses ASP.NET’s Viewstate but maybe without any MAC.
